thread.title: Small room, accommodating staff, fast wifi
thread.title_full: Small room, accommodating staff, fast wifi - Review of Novotel Paris La Defense, La Defense, France - TripAdvisor

author: Gladys P
title: Small room, accommodating staff, fast wifi
text: Small room, but typical size for European hotel. Accommodating staff and fast wifi. My husband and I stayed in one room, while we were in a tour group with office mates. Conveniently located as it is near train station and has a bus stop in front of the hotel.
